name: callus
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an area of hard skin, especially on the feet or hands: He had workman's hands which were rough and covered with calluses.

an area of hard, thick skin, esp. on the feet or hands: If you look at my hands, you will see the calluses of a farmer. callused adjective (also calloused) us

/ˈkæl·əst/
He stood looking down at the dark, callused palms of his hands.
